item.title: Go Workshop
item.author: mail@tahirhashmi.com (Tahir Hashmi)
item.description: Last week, I conducted a 2 day Go Workshop at my workplace. It was fun. I started day 1 with the excellent Go at Google presentation by Rob Pike, followed by my own presentation of Goâ€™s key features. The rest of Day 1 was spent taking the Go Tour. The coolest thing I did was on day 2. I mirrored my laptop on the projector and went through a fresh install of Go from source on my [newly allocated] dev box.
